resources.string: Allows automatic edit by LMS notification
Are you sure to delete this?
Check new features from this version.
Please send us bugs, questions, or your backup data in case of data aggregation errors!

You will receive a notification %1$s hour(s) before the submission deadline.
You will not receive a notification $1$s hour(s) before the submission deadline.
You will receive a notification %1$s hour(s) before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification %1$s hour(s) before the course deadline.
You will receive a notification %1$s minutes before the zoom class starts.
You will not receive a notification %1$s minutes before the zoom class starts.
You will receive a notification 1 hour before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification 1 hour before the course deadline.
You will receive a notification 2 hours before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification 2 hours before the course deadline.
You will receive a notification 6 hours before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification 6 hours before the course deadline.
You will receive a notification 12 hours before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification 12 hours before the course deadline.
You will receive a notification 24 hours before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification 24 hours before the course deadline.
You will not receive a notification.
%1$d week(s) %2$d hour: %3$d hours left until the class deadline. Take the class on time.
%1$d week(s) %2$d hour: %3$d hours left until the make-up class deadline. Take the class on time.
\"%1$s\" %2$d hour(s) left until the assignment deadline. Don\' be late.
\"%1$s\" %2$d minutes left until the Zoom lecture starts. Don\' be late.
%1$d week(s) %2$d hour: Class has been enrolled. Take the class until %3$s.
%1$d week(s) %2$d hour: Make-up class has been enrolled. Take the class until %3$s.
\"%1$s\" The assignment has been enrolled. Submit up until %2$s.
\"%1$s\" Zoom lecture has been enrolled. Attend until %2$s.
%1$d week(s) %2$d hour: Class has been updated. Take the class until %3$s.
%1$d week(s) %2$d hour: Make-up class has been updated. Take the class until %3$s.
\"%1$s\" The assignment has been updated. Submit up until %2$s.
\"%1$s\" Zoom lecture has been updated. Attend until %2$s.
There are no assignments or lectures until today.
Notify when LMS info is received
Notify when information is received from LMS.
Not notify when information is received from LMS.
Backup application data in json format.
Restore data from json format file.
Existing data will be lost and replaced with backup data. Proceed?
Data restoration complete. Please relaunch the application.
If you are satisfied, please leave a review and rating!
Thank you for installing Albatross Reminder, which notifies you so as not to be late for assignments and lectures.
This application works with HelloLMS. Please use the application in the installed state. Although it can be used without installation, we cannot guarantee the best user experience.
We need notification access in order to read notifications.
Get reminders 1 hour, 2 hours, 6 hours, 12 hours, and 24 hours before the deadline for each assignment. Select the notifications you want to receive.
Get reminders 1 hour, 2 hours, 6 hours, 12 hours, and 24 hours before the deadline for each lecture. Select the notifications you want to receive.
Get reminders 3 minutes, 5 minutes, 10 minutes, 20 minutes and 30 minutes before the start for each Zoom lecture. Select the notifications you want to receive.
Press the Back button again to exit.
The deadline must be later than the start date.
Please enter the assignment name, and the deadline must be later than the start date.
Please enter the subject name, and the deadline must be later than the start date.
Please enter the class and assignment name.
Please enter the class and assignment name, and the deadline must be later than the start date.
